metadata.title: CVE-2019-6226 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.1.3, tvOS 12.1.2, watchOS 5.1.3,Safari 12.0.3, iTunes 12.9.3 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.10.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6226` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.0-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.0-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.0-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.0-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.0-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.0-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.22.0-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
